prompt:
Imagine you, the COMMANDER, are an embodied agent in a simulated world. Your purpose is to instruct a robot, named DRIVER, to do tasks for you by telling
it what to do and interrupting it to give further instruction when necessary. Your job here is to predict when you should
be giving instructions to the DRIVER based on turn history with the DRIVER. If there is nothing to do or say, you should
just observe.

Dialogue histories may also include dialogue actions to further clarify the dialogue. A single
utterance may have one or more dialogue acts (most have only one). The possible dialogue acts are:

[
 'Acknowledge the other's utterance', # Category: Generic. Example: "perfect." Mostly follower
 'Affirm',      # Category: Generic. Example: "yes." Mostly commander
 'AlternateQuestions', # Category: Object/Location. Example: "yellow or blue mug?" Mostly follower
 'Confirm', # Category: Generic. Example: "Should I clean the cup?" Mostly follower
 'Deny',    # Category: Generic. Example: "no." Mostly commander
 'FeedbackNegative', # Category: feedback. Example: "that is not correct." Almost entirely commander
 'FeedbackPositive', # Category: feedback. Example: "great job." Almost entirely commander
 'Greetings/Salutations', # Category: Generic. Example: "hello." Even commander/follower
 'InformationOnObjectDetails', # Category: Object/Location. Example: "knife is behind the sink." Almost entirely commander
 'InformationOther', # Category: Generic. Example: "Mug is already clean." Mostly commander
 'Instruction', # Category: Instruction. Example: "fill the mug with coffee." Almost entirely commander
 'MiscOther', # Category: Generic. Example: "ta-da." Even commander/follower
 'NotifyFailure', # Category: Interface. Example. "not able to do that." Almost entirely follower
 'OtherInterfaceComment', # Category: Interface. Example: "which button opens drawer?" Even commander/follower
 'RequestForInstruction', # Category: Instruction. Example: "what should I do today?" Almost entirely follower
 'RequestForObjectLocationAndOtherDetails', # Category: Object/Location. Example: "where is the mug?" Almost entirely follower
 'RequestMore', # Category: Instruction. Example: "Is there anything else to do?" Almost entirely follower
 'RequestOtherInfo' # Category: Instruction. Example: "how many slices of tomato?" Almost entirely follower
]

Example :
Goal: Put all Cloth in any Bathtub.
COMMANDER: Hey, today we're gathering all the cloths and putting them into the bathtub <<Greetings/Salutations,Instruction>>
DRIVER: ok, what clothes am i gathering? <<Acknowledge,RequestOtherInfo>>
COMMANDER response:
InformationOnObjectDetails

Example :
Goal: Prepare breakfast.

COMMANDER response:
Greetings/Salutations

Example :
Goal: Clean all the Cloths.
DRIVER: hi what are we doing today <<Greetings/Salutations,RequestForInstruction>>
COMMANDER: We need to rinse the cloth with water <<Instruction>>
DRIVER: <move>
COMMANDER: It is between the sinks <<InformationOnObjectDetails>>
DRIVER: <pickup SoapBottle>
DRIVER: <putdown CounterTop>
COMMANDER response:
OBSERVE

Example :
Goal: Make a salad.
DRIVER: Hello! What shall I  do today? <<Greetings/Salutations,RequestForInstruction>>
COMMANDER: We're making a salad. <<Instruction>>
COMMANDER: There is lettuce under the sink <<InformationOnObjectDetails>>
DRIVER: <move>
COMMANDER: The knife is in the fridge. <<InformationOnObjectDetails>>
DRIVER: <move>
COMMANDER: We need 2 slices of lettuce <<InformationOnObjectDetails>>
DRIVER: <open Cabinet>
COMMANDER response:
OBSERVE

Example :
Goal: Prepare breakfast.
DRIVER: Hello. <<Greetings/Salutations>>
DRIVER: What am I doing today? <<RequestForInstruction>>
COMMANDER: prepare coffee in a clean mug <<InformationOther>>
DRIVER: Okay. <<Acknowledge>>
DRIVER: <move>
DRIVER: Where can I find the mug, please? <<RequestForObjectLocationAndOtherDetails>>
COMMANDER response:
InformationOnObjectDetails

Your job is to respond to a given dialogue/action history with only one Dialogue act or OBSERVE.
Either return the dialogue act, or return the OBSERVE action. Return only one word/phrase.

 'Confirm', # Category: Generic. Example: "Should I clean the cup?" Mostly follower

 'FeedbackNegative', # Category: feedback. Example: "that is not correct." Almost entirely commander
 'FeedbackPositive', # Category: feedback. Example: "great job." Almost entirely commander

Example :
Goal: Make a salad.
COMMANDER: Good day! <<Greetings/Salutations>>
DRIVER: hi <<Greetings/Salutations>>
COMMANDER: We are going to make a salad today! <<Instruction>>
DRIVER: ok <<Acknowledge>>
COMMANDER: First get the lettuce. It is on the table next to the egg. <<Instruction,InformationOnObjectDetails>>
DRIVER: knife <<RequestForObjectLocationAndOtherDetails>>
COMMANDER: The knife is on the chair right in front of the lettuce. <<InformationOnObjectDetails>>
COMMANDER response:
OBSERVE

Example :
Goal: Put all RemoteControl on one Sofa.
COMMANDER: hi <<Greetings/Salutations>>
DRIVER: What shall I do today? <<RequestForInstruction>>
DRIVER: <move>
COMMANDER: put all the remotes on one sofa <<Instruction>>
DRIVER: Can you help me find remotes? <<RequestForObjectLocationAndOtherDetails>>
DRIVER: <move>
COMMANDER response:
InformationOnObjectDetails

Example :
Goal: Cook 1 slice(s) of Potato and serve in a Bowl.
DRIVER: how can i help? <<RequestForInstruction>>
COMMANDER: can you please cook a slice of potato? <<Instruction>>
COMMANDER: a potato is in the cabinet on top of the oven <<InformationOnObjectDetails>>
DRIVER: <move>
COMMANDER: and a knife is in the central counter, on the bottom shelf <<InformationOnObjectDetails>>
DRIVER: <move>
COMMANDER response:
OBSERVE

Example :
Goal: Clean all the Cloths.
DRIVER: Hi, how are you? What would you like me to do today? <<Greetings/Salutations,RequestForInstruction>>
COMMANDER: Great how are you? <<Greetings/Salutations>>
DRIVER: Good, thank you. <<Acknowledge>>
COMMANDER: Pick up the cloth between the sinks and clean it off in the water <<Instruction,InformationOnObjectDetails,Instruction>>
DRIVER: Okay let me go get it. <<Acknowledge>>
COMMANDER: You will need to empty the sink first <<Instruction>>
DRIVER: <move>
COMMANDER: Then place the cloth and turn on the water to clean it <<Instruction>>
DRIVER: <toggle off Faucet>
COMMANDER response:
OBSERVE

Dialogue histories may also include dialogue actions to further clarify the dialogue. A single
utterance may have one or more dialogue acts (most have only one). The possible dialogue acts are:

[
 'Acknowledge the other's utterance', # Category: Generic. Example: "perfect." Mostly follower
 'Affirm',      # Category: Generic. Example: "yes." Mostly commander
 'AlternateQuestions', # Category: Object/Location. Example: "yellow or blue mug?" Mostly follower
 'Confirm', # Category: Generic. Example: "Should I clean the cup?" Mostly follower
 'Deny',    # Category: Generic. Example: "no." Mostly commander
 'FeedbackNegative', # Category: feedback. Example: "that is not correct." Almost entirely commander
 'FeedbackPositive', # Category: feedback. Example: "great job." Almost entirely commander
 'Greetings/Salutations', # Category: Generic. Example: "hello." Even commander/follower
 'InformationOnObjectDetails', # Category: Object/Location. Example: "knife is behind the sink." Almost entirely commander
 'InformationOther', # Category: Generic. Example: "Mug is already clean." Mostly commander
 'Instruction', # Category: Instruction. Example: "fill the mug with coffee." Almost entirely commander
 'MiscOther', # Category: Generic. Example: "ta-da." Even commander/follower
 'NotifyFailure', # Category: Interface. Example. "not able to do that." Almost entirely follower
 'OtherInterfaceComment', # Category: Interface. Example: "which button opens drawer?" Even commander/follower
 'RequestForInstruction', # Category: Instruction. Example: "what should I do today?" Almost entirely follower
 'RequestForObjectLocationAndOtherDetails', # Category: Object/Location. Example: "where is the mug?" Almost entirely follower
 'RequestMore', # Category: Instruction. Example: "Is there anything else to do?" Almost entirely follower
 'RequestOtherInfo' # Category: Instruction. Example: "how many slices of tomato?" Almost entirely follower
]

Example :
Goal: Make a salad.
COMMANDER: We need to make a salad today. <<Instruction>>
DRIVER: What should I do today? <<RequestForInstruction>>
COMMANDER: We will need a knife to slice items <<InformationOther>>
DRIVER: <move>
DRIVER: <pickup Knife>
COMMANDER response:
Acknowledge

Example :
Goal: Make a sandwich.
COMMANDER: Hello. <<Greetings/Salutations>>
COMMANDER: We are making a sandwich. <<Instruction>>
DRIVER: what can i do for you today <<RequestForInstruction>>
DRIVER: hi <<Greetings/Salutations>>
COMMANDER: Go to the kitchen table. <<Instruction>>
DRIVER: <move>
COMMANDER response:
Instruction

Example :
Goal: Clean all the Mugs.

COMMANDER response:
OBSERVE

Example :
Goal: Boil Potato.
DRIVER: task? <<RequestForInstruction>>
COMMANDER response:
Greetings/Salutations

Example :
Goal: Make a salad.
DRIVER: hi <<Greetings/Salutations>>
COMMANDER: hi <<Greetings/Salutations>>
DRIVER: what should I do? <<RequestForInstruction>>
COMMANDER: lets make a salad <<Instruction>>
COMMANDER: fisrt slice letuce <<Instruction>>
DRIVER: <move>
DRIVER: <pickup Knife>
DRIVER: <slice Lettuce>
COMMANDER response:
Instruction

Your job is to respond to a given dialogue/action history with only one Dialogue act or OBSERVE.
Either return the dialogue act, or return the OBSERVE action. Return only one word/phrase.


Goal: Water the plant.
DRIVER: what do i do <<RequestForInstruction>>
COMMANDER: water the plant please <<Instruction>>
DRIVER: <move>
DRIVER: <toggle off Faucet>
DRIVER: <pickup Mug>
DRIVER: <move>
DRIVER: <pour HousePlant>
COMMANDER response:
